address: Xã Gio Quang, Huyện Gio Linh, Tỉnh Quảng Trị
thought:
**Analyzing the Administrative Restructuring of Gio Quang**

Okay, so I'm tasked with mapping the old address to a new administrative unit. My initial thought process is to break this down into a series of logical steps, given my expertise in these types of administrative changes.

First, I need to identify the old administrative units from the input address. It's "Xã Gio Quang" (ward), "Huyện Gio Linh" (district), and "Tỉnh Quảng Trị" (province). Easy enough.

Now, I'll consult the relevant resolutions. My go-to is always checking provincial resolutions, specifically the 60-NQ/TW series. I need to understand if there are any province-level mergers or reorganizations affecting Quảng Trị. I see Quảng Trị is listed under "Các đơn vị hành chính cấp tỉnh không thực hiện sáp nhập," so no province-level changes there. Though I notice mention of a merger with Quảng Bình in item 9, this doesn't actually change the name or status of Quảng Trị itself.

The key lies in the other resolutions, and "1680/NQ-UBTVQH15" pops up as the most relevant one, as expected. Diving into this, line 43 is the gem. It explicitly states that "Xã Gio Quang" will be merged with other areas to form a new "Xã Gio Linh." Bingo! That’s the critical piece of information.

Next, I have to validate this against the provided list of new wards. I cross-reference the output with the new ward data. Sure enough, the data confirms the existence of "Xã Gio Linh" with the same province name.  The new ward object perfectly matches the information from the resolution.  This confirms my analysis.

Putting it all together, my output will reflect that "Xã Gio Quang" is now part of the new "Xã Gio Linh." The province remains "Tỉnh Quảng Trị." Confidence is high because the resolution is explicit about the merger. I'm ready to construct the JSON output reflecting this confirmed mapping.

citation.header: 1680/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Quảng Trị
citation.line: 43. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của thị trấn Gio Linh vàcác xã Gio Quang, Gio Mỹ, Phong Bình thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Gio Linh.
